sentences.sContent: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor without delay.
sentences.sCn: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

sentences.sContent: I can’t believe you sold the car without consulting me!
sentences.sCn: 我真不敢相信你不和我商量一下就把车给卖了！

words.tran: 咨询；磋商；[临床] 会诊；讨论会

trans.tranCn: 请教，向...咨询；找...商量；查阅，查看
trans.tranOther: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something
